pages.text: Devices needed to write music to $(l:iammusicplayer:item_or_block_with_feature/cassette_tape)Cassette Tapes$(/l).$(br)Please refer to $(l:iammusicplayer:how_to_listen/write_to_cassette_tape)Writing to cassette tape$(/l) for the writing method.
Besides writing music, you can also play music from $(l:iammusicplayer:item_or_block_with_feature/cassette_tape)Cassette Tapes$(/l)
